languages.text: {n}Маражай прищуривает глаза — и одним движением запястья закручивает гибкий хвост агонатора вокруг своей руки. Спустя мгновение по телу друкари словно проходит волна, от которой Маражай закатывает глаза, выгибается и закидывает голову назад. Несколько судорог пронзают его тело, пока, наконец, из его горла не доносится сдавленный вздох. Хвост агонатора соскальзывает с запястья друкари, и тот бросает на вас помутневший взгляд.{/n}

{n}Marazhai half-closes his eyes, and with a flick of his wrist, he twists the agoniser's flexible tail around his arm. A moment later, a wave passes through the Drukhari's body, sending his eyes rolling into the back of his skull and making him arch his spine and throw his head back. Spasm after spasm courses through his body, until finally a stifled gasp claws its way out of his throat. The agoniser's tail slips from Marazhai's wrist, and he looks at you with unfocused eyes.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай прищуривает глаза — и одним движением запястья закручивает гибкий хвост агонатора вокруг своей руки. Спустя мгновение по телу друкари словно проходит волна, от которой Маражай закатывает глаза, выгибается и закидывает голову назад. Несколько судорог пронзают его тело, пока, наконец, из его горла не доносится сдавленный вздох. Хвост агонатора соскальзывает с запястья друкари, и тот бросает на вас помутневший взгляд.{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋半闭着双眼，手腕一抖，便将折磨之鞭柔软的鞭身缠在了手臂上。片刻之后，一股冲击波从鞭上传来，刺穿了他的身体。他立刻翻起了白眼，弓起了后背，头也朝后仰去。他的身体一阵又一阵地痉挛着，直到最后喉中发出一声闷哼。在那之后，折磨之鞭的鞭尾从玛拉斋手腕上滑落下来，他以失了焦的目光看着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai half-closes his eyes, and with a flick of his wrist, he twists the agoniser's flexible tail around his arm. A moment later, a wave passes through the Drukhari's body, sending his eyes rolling into the back of his skull and making him arch his spine and throw his head back. Spasm after spasm courses through his body, until finally a stifled gasp claws its way out of his throat. The agoniser's tail slips from Marazhai's wrist, and he looks at you with unfocused eyes.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋半闭着双眼，手腕一抖，便将折磨之鞭柔软的鞭身缠在了手臂上。片刻之后，一股冲击波从鞭上传来，刺穿了他的身体。他立刻翻起了白眼，弓起了后背，头也朝后仰去。他的身体一阵又一阵地痉挛着，直到最后喉中发出一声闷哼。在那之后，折磨之鞭的鞭尾从玛拉斋手腕上滑落下来，他以失了焦的目光看着你。{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは目を半分閉じると、手首を軽く動かしてアゴナイザーの自由に動く尾部を腕に巻き付けた。少しの間の後、デュカーリの体を波が駆け巡り、ぐるりと白目をむいて後ろにのけ反った。体が何度も痙攣し、最終的に喉から息を切らしながらクククと笑い声を絞り出す。アゴナイザーの尾部がマラズハイの手首から滑り落ち、彼は焦点の合わない目でこちらを見つめていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai half-closes his eyes, and with a flick of his wrist, he twists the agoniser's flexible tail around his arm. A moment later, a wave passes through the Drukhari's body, sending his eyes rolling into the back of his skull and making him arch his spine and throw his head back. Spasm after spasm courses through his body, until finally a stifled gasp claws its way out of his throat. The agoniser's tail slips from Marazhai's wrist, and he looks at you with unfocused eyes.{/n}

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai entorna los ojos y, con un giro de muñeca, enrolla el flexible cuerpo del agonizador en torno a su brazo. Al instante una sacudida recorre el cuerpo del drukhari, que pone los ojos en blanco, arquea la espalda y echa la cabeza hacia atrás. Su cuerpo se estremece con un espasmo tras otro, hasta que finalmente brota un gemido de su garganta. El agonizador se escurre de la muñeca de Marazhai, y el drukhari se vuelve hacia ti con la mirada perdida.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai half-closes his eyes, and with a flick of his wrist, he twists the agoniser's flexible tail around his arm. A moment later, a wave passes through the Drukhari's body, sending his eyes rolling into the back of his skull and making him arch his spine and throw his head back. Spasm after spasm courses through his body, until finally a stifled gasp claws its way out of his throat. The agoniser's tail slips from Marazhai's wrist, and he looks at you with unfocused eyes.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les yeux mi-clos, Marazhai enroule l'appendice flexible du neurocide autour de son bras d'un savant geste du poignet. Un instant plus tard, une onde électrique parcourt le corps du Drukhari ; ses yeux se révulsent, son dos se courbe et il rejette la tête en arrière. Les spasmes se succèdent sans discontinuer jusqu'à ce qu'un halètement étouffé jaillisse de sa gorge, après quoi la queue de l'appareil relâche son étreinte et il rive sur vous des yeux hagards.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai half-closes his eyes, and with a flick of his wrist, he twists the agoniser's flexible tail around his arm. A moment later, a wave passes through the Drukhari's body, sending his eyes rolling into the back of his skull and making him arch his spine and throw his head back. Spasm after spasm courses through his body, until finally a stifled gasp claws its way out of his throat. The agoniser's tail slips from Marazhai's wrist, and he looks at you with unfocused eyes.{/n}

Un instant plus tard, une onde électrique parcourt le corps du Drukhari ; ses yeux se révulsent, son dos se courbe et il rejette la tête en arrière. Les spasmes se succèdent sans discontinuer jusqu'à ce qu'un halètement étouffé jaillisse de sa gorge, après quoi la queue de l'appareil relâche son étreinte et il rive sur vous des yeux hagards.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai schließt halb die Augen und mit einer raschen Handbewegung windet er das biegsame Ende des Peinigers um seinen Arm. Kurz darauf wird der Körper des Drukhari von einer Schmerzwelle erfasst. Sie sorgt dafür, dass seine Augäpfel nach oben rollen, sich seine Wirbelsäule krümmt und er seinen Kopf zurückwirft. Ein Krampf in seinem Körper folgt dem nächsten, bis schließlich ein unterdrücktes Atmen aus seiner Kehle ertönt. Der Ende des Peinigers rutscht von Marazhais Handgelenk und er blickt dich mit nicht fokussierten Augen an.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai half-closes his eyes, and with a flick of his wrist, he twists the agoniser's flexible tail around his arm. A moment later, a wave passes through the Drukhari's body, sending his eyes rolling into the back of his skull and making him arch his spine and throw his head back. Der Ende des Peinigers rutscht von Marazhais Handgelenk und er blickt dich mit nicht fokussierten Augen an.{/n}
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, gözlerini kısarak kendi bileğine bir fiske indiriyor ve kıvrandıranın esnek kuyruğunu koluna doluyor. Bir süre sonra Drukhari'nin bedeninden bir dalga geçerek gözlerinin beyazını ortaya çıkarıyor ve kamburunu çıkararak kafasını geriye atmasına neden oluyor. Üst üste gelen spazmlar, en nihayetinde boğazından güçlükle verdiği boğuk bir nefes çıkana dek tüm bedenine yayılmayı sürdürüyor. Kıvrandıranın kuyruğu, Marazhai'ın bileğinden kayıyor. Marazhai, odaklanmakta zorlanan gözlerle sana bakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai half-closes his eyes, and with a flick of his wrist, he twists the agoniser's flexible tail around his arm.
